description: The plan to burn a Koran in a mainly-Muslim area was described as "a serious threat to public order".
title: Belgium expels Danish right-wing activists over plot to burn Koran
title_page: Belgium expels Danish right-wing activists over plot to burn Koran - BBC News
maintext: "They were ordered to leave the country quickly, which they did," his office quoted him saying. "The stay was refused because these men represent a serious threat to public order in Belgium."
